member.name: T:Syncfusion.XForms.TabView.TabItemCollection
member.summary: Represents a collection which holds the children for tab control through the collection of .

member.name: T:Syncfusion.XForms.TabView.OverflowMode
member.summary: Describes the possible values for overflow mode. These values are used to update the header layout in control, based on that pagination for excess tabs can be displayed.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.TabView.OverflowMode.Scroll
member.summary: Specifies the scrollable header to view the excess tabs.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.TabView.OverflowMode.DropDown
member.summary: Specifies the expandable more drop down menu.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.XForms.TabView.TabHeaderPosition
member.summary: Describes the possible values for the position of header layout in control.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.TabView.TabHeaderPosition.Top
member.summary: Specifies the top location above the content region of control.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.TabView.TabHeaderPosition.Bottom
member.summary: Specifies the bottom location below the content region of control.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.XForms.TabView.TabDisplayMode
member.summary: Describes the possible values for the display type of headers in control.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.TabView.TabDisplayMode.Image
member.summary: Specifies the image type for header in control.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.TabView.TabDisplayMode.Text
member.summary: Specifies the text type for header in control.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.TabView.TabDisplayMode.ImageWithText
member.summary: Specifies both image as well as text for the header in control.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.TabView.TabDisplayMode.NoHeader
member.summary: Specifies the no header in control.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.XForms.TabView.OverflowButtonDisplayMode
member.summary: Option to choose the type of header for its rendering content.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.TabView.OverflowButtonDisplayMode.Text
member.summary: Specifies the text type for more button in control, when is set as drop down.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.TabView.OverflowButtonDisplayMode.Image
member.summary: Specifies the image type for more button in control, when is set as drop down.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.TabView.OverflowButtonDisplayMode.ImageWithText
member.summary: Specifies both image as well as text for more button in control, when is set as drop down.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.XForms.TabView.SelectionIndicatorPosition
member.summary: Describes the possible values for the position of selection strip in control, selection indicator is to indicate the selected index in the control.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.TabView.SelectionIndicatorPosition.Top
member.summary: Specifies the top location for the selection indicator in control.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.TabView.SelectionIndicatorPosition.Bottom
member.summary: Specifies the bottom location for the selection indicator in control.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.TabView.SelectionIndicatorPosition.Fill
member.summary: Specifies the fill region for the selection indicator in control.
member.remarks: Selection color of should be varied with the strip color when set this value. />
